name: Clif Bar Oatmeal Raisin Walnut Energy Bar
description:
A great tasting energy bar with a chewy texture that's similar to home-baked goodies!Oatmeal, raisin, and walnut flavour.All natural ingredients – 70% organic.No trans fats.Ingredients: Organic brown rice syrup, ClifPro® (soy rice crisps [soy protein isolate, rice flour, malt extract], organic roasted soybeans, organic soy flour), organic rolled oats, raisins, walnuts, organic evaporated cane juice, ClifCrunch® (organic oat fibre, chicory extract, organic flaxseed, psyllium), organic oat bran, molasses powder, natural flavours, ground cinnamon, sea salt.

        Sustainability
